text: {| |} MV Guanabara is an oil tanker which was attacked by four pirates on 5 March 2011. The tanker was attacked by four armed Somali pirates at 3pm on 5 March 2011. The crew of 24 hid in a safe room, and summoned help from and the Turkish . The pirates were captured without a fight. Three of the pirates were indicted in Japan, the fourth was turned over to juvenile authorities, as it was determined that he was a minor. ==References== Category:Active merchant ships of Japan Category:Maritime incidents in 2011 Category:Oil tankers Category:Piracy in Somalia Category:2007 ships
title: MV Guanabara
